title: buff zoe
body:
buff zoe she is weak 0 dmg

replies.body: Oh here comes another wave of begging for Zoe nerfs

> [{quoted}](name=Hi lm Zoe,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I9xQ3ToJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-23T20:08:42.832+0000)
>
> Oh here comes another wave of begging for Zoe nerfs

I asked for buffs

> [{quoted}](name=Ch첫os,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I9xQ3ToJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-25T05:09:56.478+0000)
>
> I asked for buffs

I hoped you said that ironically
I'd rather that they change her. Backload a lot of her damage into proccing Trouble Bubble, then even out Q so that it does middling damage unless it's max-range.
She is fine you just need to get better at the game.
